Nightlight::
She woke up and sat in the floor. She was stunned and said "Where... 
Where am I?"

When she heard Aerotaur's voice she stands up and walked where he 
was. "Are you ok Aerotaur?" said Nighlight when she saw the wounds 
that Clash had done him, she added "It isn't your fault, Aerotaur, 
you didn't know that they would attack us... How could you know it?" 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He looks up from his contemplation now that Nightlight had 
emerged from 
> the CR chamber.  "You okay?"  He was still a little groggy from his 
sitting.  
> He stands up and walks over to her.  "I'm sorry.  I should've been 
here 
> instead of off trying to save some stranger."
